H0.text: The Rio Grande forms the border of Texas with what other area. Mexico

H1.text: The Rio Grande forms the border of Texas with what other area. New Mexico

H2.text: The Rio Grande forms the border of Texas with what other area. Arizona

H3.text: The Rio Grande forms the border of Texas with what other area. EUM

A4.text: South of El Paso, the Rio Grande is the national border between the U.S. and Mexico.

A5.text: a short segment of the Rio Grande is a partial state-boundary between the U.S. states of New Mexico and Texas.

A6.text: Mexico is on the left and the US is on the right

A7.text: The Rio Grande forms a natural border with the Mexican states of Chihuahua, Coahuila, Nuevo Le√≥n, and Tamaulipas to the south.
